author: wddgit
body:
Fix makes the code perform as it appears was originally
intended. This appears to have been a real bug.

But I don't think this bug had any bad consequences.
I reported it to the lumi hypernews.
Zhen says "This module is no more supported nor it is of
any real use. However, other CMS production people prefer
running it empty."
title: Fix GCC 8 compiler warnings
